title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions
While pasta cooks, cut guanciale into small cubes and cook in a pan until crispy
In a bowl, whisk eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper
When pasta is al dente, reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain
Working quickly, add hot pasta to the pan with guanciale, then remove from heat
Add egg mixture, stirring quickly to coat pasta and create a creamy sauce
Add pasta water as needed to achieve desired consistency
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 4 hours
Grill or broil chicken until charred and cooked through
In a large pot, saut√© onions, garlic, and ginger until golden
Add tomatoes and spices, simmer until oil separates
Blend sauce until smooth, return to pot
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes
Finish with butter and garnish with cilantro
Serve hot with naan bread and rice

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
summary: A healthy and colorful bowl packed with quinoa, fresh vegetables, feta cheese, and a zesty lemon dressing. Perfect for clean eating.
instructions: Rinse quinoa thoroughly and cook in vegetable broth
While quinoa cooks, chop all vegetables
Make dressing with olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs
Once quinoa is cooked, let it cool slightly
Combine quinoa with chopped vegetables
Add crumbled feta and olives
Drizzle with dressing and toss gently
Serve at room temperature or chilled

title: Classic French Toast
summary: Thick slices of brioche bread dipped in vanilla-scented custard and grilled to golden perfection. Served with maple syrup and berries.
instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt
Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium heat
Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture
Melt butter in the pan
Cook each slice until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side
Keep warm in a low oven while cooking remaining slices
Serve with maple syrup and fresh berries
Dust with powdered sugar if desired
